TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit AssemblyName extends System.Object implements class System.ICloneable, class System.Runtime.InteropServices._AssemblyName, class System.Runtime.Serialization.IDeserializationCallback, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public NotInheritable Class AssemblyName Implements _AssemblyName, ICloneable, IDeserializationCallback, ISerializable

public ref class AssemblyName sealed : ICloneable, System::Runtime::InteropServices::_AssemblyName, System::Runtime::Serialization::IDeserializationCallback, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable

summary.span: 完整描述組件的唯一識別。

span.span: Describes an assembly's unique identity in full.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件包含的組件，您可以使用繫結至該組件相關資訊。The object contains information about an assembly, which you can use to bind to that assembly. 組件的識別是由下列項目所組成：An assembly's identity consists of the following: - 簡單名稱。Simple name. - 版本號碼。Version number. - 密碼編譯金鑰組。Cryptographic key pair. - 支援的文化特性。Supported culture. 簡單名稱通常是資訊清單檔案不含副檔名的檔案名稱。The simple name is typically the file name for the manifest file without its extension. 金鑰組則包含公開和私密金鑰的金鑰，用來建立組件的強式名稱簽章。The key pair includes a public and private key, used to create strong-name signatures for assemblies. 支援通用語言執行平台的所有編譯器會都發出的簡單名稱的巢狀類別，並反映建構查詢時，根據下列慣例 mangled 的名稱。All compilers that support the common language runtime will emit the simple name of a nested class, and reflection constructs a mangled name when queried, in accordance with the following conventions. |分隔符號Delimiter|意義Meaning| |---------------|-------------| |反斜線 (\\)Backslash (\\)|逸出字元。Escape character.| |逗號 （，）Comma (,)|後面接著組件名稱。Precedes the assembly name.| |加號 （+）Plus sign (+)|之前的巢狀的類別。Precedes a nested class.| 例如，類別的完整限定的名稱可能看起來像這樣：For example, the fully qualified name for a class might look like this: ContainingClass+NestedClass,MyAssemblyContainingClass+NestedClass,MyAssembly A"+ +"會變成"\\+\\+ 」，和 「\\能夠又 「 變"\\\\"。A "++" becomes "\\+\\+", and a "\\" becomes "\\\\". 這個限定的名稱可以保存下來，並稍後用來載入。This qualified name can be persisted and later used to load the . 搜尋並載入，使用與型別名稱只有或組件限定的類型名稱。To search for and load a , use either with the type name only or with the assembly qualified type name. 與類型名稱只會尋找在呼叫者的組件，然後系統組件。 with the type name only will look for the in the caller's assembly and then in the System assembly. 與組件限定的類型名稱會尋找任何組件中。 with the assembly qualified type name will look for the in any assembly. 完整指定必須有主要版本、 次要版本、 組建編號和修訂編號的參數名稱、 文化特性、 公開金鑰語彙基元。A fully specified must have the name, culture, public key or public key token, major version, minor version, build number, and revision number parameters. 最後四個封裝在型別。The last four are packaged in the type. 若要建立簡單的名稱，建立物件使用預設建構函式，並設定。To create a simple name, create an object using the default constructor and set the . 其他屬性是選擇性的。The other properties are optional. 若要建立完整的強式名稱，建立物件使用預設建構函式，並設定和。To create a full strong name, create an object using the default constructor and set the and . 其他屬性是選擇性的。The other properties are optional. 使用和設定的公開金鑰和強式名稱。Use and to set the public key and the strong name. 強式名稱簽署一律會使用雜湊演算法。The strong name signing always uses the hash algorithm. 若要確保名稱正確建構，請使用下列屬性：To ensure that the names are constructed correctly, use the following properties: - - - 您也可以使用，取得名稱`/l`選項與[Gacutil.exe （全域組件快取工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/gacutil-exe-gac-tool.md)You can also get the name by using the `/l` option with the [Gacutil.exe (Global Assembly Cache Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/gacutil-exe-gac-tool.md) 部分指定強式名稱時，請建立物件使用預設建構函式，並設定名稱和公開金鑰。For a partially specified strong name, create an object using the default constructor and set the name and public key. 建立使用這類的組件可以稍後使用組件連結器 (Al.exe) 簽署。An assembly created using such an can be signed later using the Assembly Linker (Al.exe). 您可指定公開金鑰和不一致的值。It is possible to specify a public key and a with inconsistent values. 這可以是開發人員的案例中很有用。This can be useful in developer scenarios. 在此情況下，公用金鑰擷取指定正確的公用金鑰，while指定在開發期間使用的公用和私用的索引鍵。In this case, the public key retrieved with specifies the correct public key, while the specifies the public and private keys used during development. 當執行階段偵測到不符和公開金鑰，它會查閱登錄中正確與公開金鑰相符的索引鍵。When the runtime detects a mismatch between the and the public key, it looks up in the registry the correct key that matches the public key. 顯示名稱的格式逗點分隔的 Unicode 字串的開頭名稱，如下所示：The format of the display name of an is a comma-delimited Unicode string that begins with the name, as follows: `Name <,Culture = CultureInfo> <,Version = Major.Minor.Build.Revision> <, StrongName> <,PublicKeyToken> '\0'` `Name` 為組件的文字的名稱。`Name` is the textual name of the assembly. `CultureInfo` 為 RFC1766 格式定義的文化特性。`CultureInfo` is the RFC1766-format-defined culture. `Major``Minor`， `Build`，和`Revision`是主要版本、 次要版本、 組建編號和修訂編號的組件。`Major`, `Minor`, `Build`, and `Revision` are the major version, minor version, build number, and revision number of the assembly. `StrongName` 為十六進位編碼低序位 64 位元的使用 sha-1 雜湊演算法所產生的公開金鑰和公開金鑰所指定的雜湊值。`StrongName` is the hexadecimal-encoded low-order 64 bits of the hash value of the public key generated using the SHA-1 hashing algorithm and the public key specified by . `PublicKeyToken` 是十六進位編碼公開金鑰指定。`PublicKeyToken` is the hexadecimal-encoded public key specified by . 十六進位編碼格式定義為每個位元組的二進位物件轉換為兩個十六進位字元，最小行進到最大顯著性位元組。Hexadecimal encoding is defined as the conversion of each byte of a binary object to two hexadecimal characters, progressing from least to most significant byte. 必要時，就會加入額外的顯示值。Additional display values will be added as deemed necessary. 如果已知完整公開金鑰，然後可能會取代 PublicKey 的 StrongName。If the full public key is known, then PublicKey may be substituted for StrongName. 也請注意，除了`Name`這必須先出現，語彙參數的順序並不重要。Also note that except for `Name`, which must come first, the lexical order of parameters is unimportant. 不過，任何參數 (`Version`， `Culture`，`StrongName`或`PublicKey`) 沒有特別設定會被視為省略，而則被視為部分。However, any parameter (`Version`, `Culture`, `StrongName` or `PublicKey`) not specifically set is considered to be omitted, and the is then considered partial. 在指定的部分資訊，則必須指定名稱參數，上面所述的順序。When specifying partial information, Name parameters must be specified in the order described above. 提供顯示名稱，慣例時`StrongName =null`或`PublicKey= null`表示需要繫結，並符合針對簡單名稱的組件。When supplying a display name, the convention `StrongName =null` or `PublicKey= null` indicates that binding and matching against a simply named assembly is required. 此外，慣例`Culture= ""`（代表空字串的雙引號括住），表示比對的預設文化特性。Additionally, the convention `Culture= ""` (double quote representing an empty string) indicates matching against the default culture. 下列範例所示簡單名稱的組件與預設文化特性。The following example shows an for a simply named assembly with default culture. ``` ExampleAssembly, Culture="" ``` 下例顯示具有 "en" 文化特性之強式名稱組件的完整指定參考。The following example shows a fully specified reference for a strongly named assembly with culture "en". ``` ExampleAssembly, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=en, PublicKeyToken=a5d015c7d5a0b012 ``` ## Examples 這個範例示範如何使用不同的反映類別來分析的組件中包含的中繼資料。This example shows how to use various reflection classes to analyze the metadata contained in an assembly. [!code-cpp[Reflection#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection/CPP/reflection.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Reflection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection/CS/Reflection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Reflection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection/VB/Reflection.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會建立名為的動態組件`MyAssembly.exe`並將它儲存到硬碟。The following example creates a dynamic assembly named `MyAssembly.exe` and saves it to your hard disk. 之後執行此範例，您可以使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)來檢查組件中繼資料。After running the example, you can use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the assembly metadata. [!code-cpp[AssemblyName_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_Constructor/CPP/assemblyname_constructor.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyName_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_Constructor/CS/assemblyname_constructor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyName_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_Constructor/VB/assemblyname_constructor.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string assemblyName) cil managed

param.name: assemblyName
param.span: 組件的顯示名稱，如同 屬性所傳回。

span.span: The display name of the assembly, as returned by the property.

summary.span: 使用指定的顯示名稱，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified display name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供`assemblyName`會剖析和新的適當欄位初始化值的顯示名稱。The supplied `assemblyName` is parsed, and the appropriate fields of the new are initialized with values from the display name. 這是建議的方法來剖析顯示名稱。This is the recommended way of parsing display names. 建議您不要撰寫您自己的程式碼剖析顯示名稱。Writing your own code to parse display names is not recommended. ## Examples 下列範例會建立的執行個體從顯示的名稱。The following example creates an instance of from a display name. 顯示名稱的個別項目為屬性，會輸出到主控台物件。The individual elements of the display name are output to the console as properties of the object. [!code-cpp[AssemblyName_Constructor_2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_Constructor_2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyName_Constructor_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_Constructor_2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyName_Constructor_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_Constructor_2/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: is .
is a zero length string.

para.span: 在[適用於 Windows 市集應用程式的 .NET](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) 或是[可攜式類別庫](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md)中，改為攔截基底類別例外狀況 。

span.span: In the [.NET for Windows Store apps](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) or the [Portable Class Library](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md), catch the base class exception, , instead.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CodeBase { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定做為 URL 之組件的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location of the assembly as a URL.

value.span: 字串，是組件的 URL 位置。

span.span: A string that is the URL location of the assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 載入組件時，這個值也可以取得使用屬性。When an assembly is loaded, this value can also be obtained using the property. 如果這個組件已載入做為位元組陣列，這個屬性會傳回呼叫者的位置方法多載，不是載入的組件的位置。If the assembly was loaded as a byte array, this property returns the location of the caller of the method overload, not the location of the loaded assembly. > [!NOTE] > 請勿使用只含屬性集。Do not use an with only the property set. 屬性沒有提供任何項目 （例如名稱或版本） 的組件識別，因此載入不會發生負載所識別的規則，根據您所預期從方法。The property does not supply any elements of the assembly identity (such as name or version), so loading does not occur according to load-by-identity rules, as you would expect from the method. 相反地，載入組件使用載入來源的規則。Instead, the assembly is loaded using load-from rules. 使用載入內容的缺點的相關資訊，請參閱方法多載或[組件載入的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/deployment/best-practices-for-assembly-loading.md)。For information about the disadvantages of using the load-from context, see the method overload or [Best Practices for Assembly Loading](~/docs/framework/deployment/best-practices-for-assembly-loading.md). ## Examples 下列範例會發出動態組件，並將它儲存到目前的目錄。The following example emits a dynamic assembly and saves it to the current directory. 建立組件時，屬性用來指定的目錄儲存組件。When the assembly is created, the property is used to specify the directory where the assembly is saved. [!code-cpp[AssemblyName_CodeBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_CodeBase/CPP/assemblyname_codebase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyName_CodeBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_CodeBase/CS/assemblyname_codebase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyName_CodeBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_CodeBase/VB/assemblyname_codebase.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會發出動態組件，並將它儲存到目前的目錄。The following example emits a dynamic assembly and saves it to the current directory. 建立組件時，屬性用來指定的文化特性的組件的顯示名稱的一部分。When the assembly is created, the property is used to specify the culture, which is part of the assembly's display name. remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會發出動態組件，並將它儲存到目前的目錄。The following example emits a dynamic assembly and saves it to the current directory. 建立組件時，屬性用來指定組件的公開金鑰。When the assembly is created, the property is used to specify that the assembly has a public key. [!code-cpp[AssemblyName_KeyPair#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_KeyPair/CPP/assemblyname_keypair.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyName_KeyPair#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_KeyPair/CS/assemblyname_keypair.cs#4)] [!code-vb[AssemblyName_KeyPair#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_KeyPair/VB/assemblyname_keypair.vb#4)]

summary.span: 取得組件的完整名稱，也稱為顯示名稱。

span.span: Gets the full name of the assembly, also known as the display name.

value.span: 字串，是組件的完整名稱，也稱為顯示名稱。

span.span: A string that is the full name of the assembly, also known as the display name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 顯示名稱通常是由簡單名稱、 版本號碼、 支援的文化特性和公開金鑰所組成。The display name typically consists of the simple name, version number, supported culture, and public key. 例如: For example: ``` mylib, Version=1.2.1900.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=a14f3033def15840 ``` 建議您不要撰寫您自己的程式碼剖析顯示名稱。Writing your own code to parse display names is not recommended. 相反地，將顯示名稱，以傳遞建構函式，它會剖析並於其中填入新的適當欄位。Instead, pass the display name to the constructor, which parses it and populates the appropriate fields of the new . 載入組件時，這個值也可以取得使用屬性。When an assembly is loaded, this value can also be obtained using the property. ## Examples 下列範例會發出動態組件，並將它儲存到目前的目錄。The following example emits a dynamic assembly and saves it to the current directory. 建立組件時，程式碼範例會將設定， ， ，和屬性，它們共同組成組件的完整名稱，或顯示名稱。When the assembly is created, the code example sets the , , , and properties, which together comprise an assembly's full name, or display name. 屬性然後用來擷取顯示名稱。The property is then used to retrieve the display name. [!code-cpp[AssemblyName_CodeBase#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_CodeBase/CPP/assemblyname_codebase.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyName_CodeBase#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_CodeBase/CS/assemblyname_codebase.cs#4)] [!code-vb[AssemblyName_CodeBase#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_CodeBase/VB/assemblyname_codebase.vb#4)]

summary.span: 取得指定檔案的 。

span.span: Gets the for a given file.

returns.span: 表示指定之組件檔的物件。

span.span: An object that represents the given assembly file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這只適如果檔案包含組件資訊清單。This will only work if the file contains an assembly manifest. 這個方法會讓檔案的開啟及關閉，但組件不會加入至這個網域。This method causes the file to be opened and closed, but the assembly is not added to this domain. ## Examples 下列範例會取得磁碟上的組件。The following example gets the for an assembly on disk. 它才會執行取代字串"MyAssembly.exe 」 （包括路徑，如有必要） 的組件的檔案名稱與您的硬碟上。It will not run unless you replace the string "MyAssembly.exe" with the file name of an assembly (including the path, if necessary) on your hard disk. 或者，您可以編譯這個範例為"MyAssembly.exe"。Alternatively, you can compile this example as "MyAssembly.exe". [!code-cpp[AssemblyName_GetAssemblyName#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_GetAssemblyName/CPP/assemblyname_getassemblyname.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyName_GetAssemblyName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_GetAssemblyName/CS/assemblyname_getassemblyname.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyName_GetAssemblyName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_GetAssemblyName/VB/assemblyname_getassemblyname.vb#1)]

is not a valid assembly.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetObjectData(class System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context) cil managed
Public Sub GetObjectData (info As SerializationInfo, context As StreamingContext)

param.name: info
param.span: 要被填入 (Populate) 序列化資訊的物件。

span.span: The object to be populated with serialization information.

param.name: context
param.span: 序列化的目的端內容。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance unsigned int8[] GetPublicKey() cil managed

summary.span: 取得組件的公開金鑰。

span.span: Gets the public key of the assembly.

returns.span: 位元組陣列，包含組件的公開金鑰。

span.span: A byte array that contains the public key of the assembly.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會發出動態組件，並將它儲存到目前的目錄。The following example emits a dynamic assembly and saves it to the current directory. 建立組件時，方法用來授與組件的公開金鑰。When the assembly is created, the method is used to give the assembly a public key. 方法可用來擷取公開金鑰，這會顯示到主控台。The method is then used to retrieve the public key, which is displayed to the console. [!code-cpp[AssemblyName_KeyPair#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_KeyPair/CPP/assemblyname_keypair.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyName_KeyPair#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_KeyPair/CS/assemblyname_keypair.cs#2)] [!code-vb[AssemblyName_KeyPair#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_KeyPair/VB/assemblyname_keypair.vb#2)]

exception.span: 已提供公開金鑰 (例如，藉由使用 方法)，但未提供公開金鑰語彙基元。

span.span: A public key was provided (for example, by using the method), but no public key token was provided.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance unsigned int8[] GetPublicKeyToken() cil managed

summary.span: 取得公開金鑰語彙基元，即是用於應用程式或組件簽名的公開金鑰 SHA-1 雜湊的最後 8 位元組。

span.span: Gets the public key token, which is the last 8 bytes of the SHA-1 hash of the public key under which the application or assembly is signed.

returns.span: 包含公開金鑰語彙基元的位元組陣列。

span.span: A byte array that contains the public key token.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會發出動態組件，並將它儲存到目前的目錄。The following example emits a dynamic assembly and saves it to the current directory. 建立組件時，方法用來設定組件的公開金鑰語彙基元。When the assembly is created, the method is used to set the assembly's public key token. 方法可用來擷取公開金鑰語彙基元，它會顯示到主控台。The method is then used to retrieve the public key token, which is displayed to the console. [!code-cpp[AssemblyName_KeyPair#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_KeyPair/CPP/assemblyname_keypair.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyName_KeyPair#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_KeyPair/CS/assemblyname_keypair.cs#3)] [!code-vb[AssemblyName_KeyPair#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_KeyPair/VB/assemblyname_keypair.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Configuration::Assemblies::AssemblyHashAlgorithm HashAlgorithm { System::Configuration::Assemblies::AssemblyHashAlgorithm get(); void set(System::Configuration::Assemblies::AssemblyHashAlgorithm value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定組件資訊清單 (Assembly Manifest) 所使用的雜湊演算法。

span.span: Gets or sets the hash algorithm used by the assembly manifest.

value.span: 組件資訊清單所使用的雜湊演算法。

span.span: The hash algorithm used by the assembly manifest.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]、屬性所傳回的物件方法如果沒有雜湊演算法參考的組件，或所參考的雜湊演算法組件不由列舉型別。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the property of an object that is returned by the method is if there is no hash algorithm for the referenced assembly, or if the hash algorithm of the referenced assembly is not identified by the enumeration. 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，屬性傳回在此情況下。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, the property returned in this situation. ## Examples 下列範例會發出動態組件，並將它儲存到目前的目錄。The following example emits a dynamic assembly and saves it to the current directory. 建立組件時，屬性用來設定組件資訊清單的雜湊演算法。When the assembly is created, the property is used to set the hash algorithm for the assembly manifest. [!code-cpp[AssemblyName_CodeBase#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_CodeBase/CPP/assemblyname_codebase.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyName_CodeBase#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_CodeBase/CS/assemblyname_codebase.cs#3)] [!code-vb[AssemblyName_CodeBase#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_CodeBase/VB/assemblyname_codebase.vb#3)]

summary.span: 取得或設定公開或私密的密碼編譯金鑰組，此金鑰組可用來建立組件的強式名稱簽章。

span.span: Gets or sets the public and private cryptographic key pair that is used to create a strong name signature for the assembly.

value.span: 要用來建立組件之強式名稱的公開及私密密碼編譯金鑰組。

span.span: The public and private cryptographic key pair to be used to create a strong name for the assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當執行階段載入組件時，不會設定屬性。When the runtime loads an assembly, it does not set the property. Getter 屬性才有用，如果使用者在使用之前設定屬性物件來建立動態組件，並接著想要擷取的金鑰組。The getter for the property is only useful if the user set the property before using the object to create a dynamic assembly, and subsequently wants to retrieve the key pair. ## Examples 下列範例會發出動態組件，並將它儲存到目前的目錄。The following example emits a dynamic assembly and saves it to the current directory. 建立組件時，屬性用來設定組件的公開金鑰和私密金鑰密碼編譯金鑰。When the assembly is created, the property is used to set the assembly's public and private cryptographic keys. 。. [!code-cpp[AssemblyName_KeyPair#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_KeyPair/CPP/assemblyname_keypair.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyName_KeyPair#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_KeyPair/CS/assemblyname_keypair.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyName_KeyPair#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_KeyPair/VB/assemblyname_keypair.vb#1)]

span.span: This is usually, but not necessarily, the file name of the manifest file of the assembly, minus its extension.
The simple name of the assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資訊清單檔案是包含組件資訊清單的檔案。The manifest file is the file that contains the assembly manifest. 例如，名為"MyAssembly.dll 」 的單一檔案組件的簡單名稱是"MyAssembly"。For example, the simple name of a single-file assembly named "MyAssembly.dll" is "MyAssembly". ## Examples 下列範例會發出動態組件，並將它儲存到目前的目錄。The following example emits a dynamic assembly and saves it to the current directory. 建立組件時，屬性用來設定動態組件的簡單名稱。When the assembly is created, the property is used to set the simple name of the dynamic assembly. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 傳回組件的完整名稱，也稱為顯示名稱。

span.span: Returns the full name of the assembly, also known as the display name.

returns.span: 組件的完整名稱，如果無法判斷組件的完整名稱，則為類別名稱。

span.span: The full name of the assembly, or the class name if the full name cannot be determined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請參閱描述傳回之字串的格式。See the description of for the format of the returned string. ## Examples 下列範例會取得假設物件`MyAssembly.exe`組件，然後再使用方法來擷取完整的組件名稱，或顯示名稱。The following example gets an object for a hypothetical `MyAssembly.exe` assembly, and then uses the method to retrieve the full assembly name, or display name. [!code-cpp[AssemblyName_GetAssemblyName#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_GetAssemblyName/CPP/assemblyname_getassemblyname.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyName_GetAssemblyName#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_GetAssemblyName/CS/assemblyname_getassemblyname.cs#2)] [!code-vb[AssemblyName_GetAssemblyName#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_GetAssemblyName/VB/assemblyname_getassemblyname.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Version ^ Version { Version ^ get(); void set(Version ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定組件的主要、次要、組建和修訂編號。

span.span: Gets or sets the major, minor, build, and revision numbers of the assembly.

value.span: 物件，表示組件的主要、次要、組建和修訂編號。

span.span: An object that represents the major, minor, build, and revision numbers of the assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有元件必須都是版本的大於或等於零的整數。All components of the version must be integers greater than or equal to zero. 中繼資料會限制主要、 次要、 組建和組件的最大值的修訂元件-1。Metadata restricts the major, minor, build, and revision components for an assembly to a maximum value of - 1. 如果元件會超過此值，則會擲不回任何錯誤;不過，在動態組件，該元件為零。If a component exceeds this value, no error is thrown; however, in a dynamic assembly, that component is zero. ## Examples 本章節包含兩個範例。This section contains two examples. 第一個範例示範如何擷取目前正在執行的組件的版本。The first example shows how to retrieve the version of the currently executing assembly. 第二個範例示範如何使用屬性來指定組件版本，當發出動態組件。The second example shows how to use the property to specify the assembly version when you emit a dynamic assembly. **範例 1****Example 1** 下列範例會擷取並顯示目前正在執行的組件和包含的組件的版本號碼類別。The following example retrieves and displays the version numbers of the currently executing assembly and the assembly that contains the class. [!code-cpp[AssemblyName.Version#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName.Version/cpp/Example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyName.Version#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName.Version/cs/Example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyName.Version#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName.Version/vb/Example.vb#1)] **範例 2****Example 2** 下列範例會發出動態組件，並將它儲存到目前的目錄。The following example emits a dynamic assembly and saves it to the current directory. 建立組件時，屬性用來指定組件的版本資訊。When the assembly is created, the property is used to specify version information for the assembly. [!code-cpp[AssemblyName_Constructor#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_Constructor/CPP/assemblyname_constructor.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyName_Constructor#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_Constructor/CS/assemblyname_constructor.cs#3)] [!code-vb[AssemblyName_Constructor#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyName_Constructor/VB/assemblyname_constructor.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Configuration::Assemblies::AssemblyVersionCompatibility VersionCompatibility { System::Configuration::Assemblies::AssemblyVersionCompatibility get(); void set(System::Configuration::Assemblies::AssemblyVersionCompatibility value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定與組件和其他組件相容性相關的資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets the information related to the assembly's compatibility with other assemblies.

value.span: 值，表示有關組件和其他組件相容性的資訊。

span.span: A value that represents information about the assembly's compatibility with other assemblies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資訊會指出，例如，組件無法透過裝置驅動程式執行與其他因衝突而產生的版本並存。 information indicates, for example, that the assembly cannot execute side-by-side with other versions due to conflicts over a device driver. 目前，一律會傳回，而且不會載入器。Currently, always returns , and is not used by the loader. 這個屬性被保留供未來的功能。This property is reserved for a future feature.
